title: "Skip waiting for stats" issue is back

replies.body: Thanks for the report, we just made a change that we believe will correct this. Please let me know if you continue to see this issue.
How long is this taking, how many seconds if you want for it to display the stats?
Yeah i saw the issue within the last 2-3 hours.

It just happened to me. It said "Skip waiting for stats" with a black screen. I clicked it and it took me directly back to the lobby. No match history as Vayne , no IP / EXP. I only needed 80 xp left to lvl up and since my team won after a 40 minute match, kinda devastated me.
Yep, I am experiencing it too again.
that doesn't explain anything. what issue?

> [{quoted}](name=Tribunal,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fRxjn2Eb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-21T10:40:05.510+0000)
>
> that doesn't explain anything. what issue?

The after game screen where it shows you stats like K/D/As and final player builds. There used to be an issue where that screen would take WAY too long to load and the screen would be stuck on the "Skip Waiting for Stats" button. Well.... now it's back

Cannot queue again if you skip as it locks you in to previous game.

 This went away last patch but now is back and I have to relog after every single match without fail.
